website_summaries.verdict: When you want a battery powered handheld vacuum, this model delivers a nice level of power.
pros: Comfortable handle, as you can pick from among four handle positions for either cleaning or storage
Carries a long battery life of 13 hours per charge
Includes a crevice tool for convenience
Even with the battery, this is a lightweight model that you can use anywhere
cons: Some problems with build quality and longevity

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere to Buy Filters
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful vacuum cleaner. It is lightweight but powerful. The only problem is that Dirt Devil does not have replacement filters (#F-101) in stock and do not expect to have more filters for another two months. I am donating my current hand vac to a local discount reseller and purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful that the flip out piece would be a great way to pick up crumbs etc in the kitchen and even more excited to have a quick way to pick up fur clumps. Unfortunately, the tiny filter gets “full” so quickly that you must clean it constantly. The flip out piece harbors fur and I cannot find a good way to clean it out. It is compact and the battery is good but I find my vacuum is easier and faster to use in the long run because this little thing doesn’t have what it takes. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Suction is stronger than other brands. Filter removes easy to clean and replace (unlike my dirt devil). It has a flipout brush attachment, so you don't have to look for attachments. We use it to spot clean rental vehicles that do not need a full detail. I am getting one for my house and throwing my dirt devil away.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum - best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Good suction power, easily get 15-20 minutes on a full charge. Only needs a little improvement on getting my Bulldog hair off my car seats. Brush attachment is nice. Also the extension part does NOT have a gap in it like other reviewers said. You have to flip it out then push it in to sea up the gap. The others are not pushing it on, they must think it should out and automatically snaps into place - it does not, just flip it out and tap it on to seal up the gap. To put it back you simply tug or pull it out then fold it back into place. Be gentle it's all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had sent it back while I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had sent it back while I had the chance. It is in the trash. I should have never purchased a pre-owned product. Live and learn. In fact I am rethinking many of my resent purchases because I have had to send back too many back. The Dust Devil never worked right and it was my fault that I let the trial period run out.
customer_reviews.author: john dodds

customer_reviews.title: suction is not great
customer_reviews.text: I had one a long time ago and I am pretty sure its sucking power was much greater.
customer_reviews.author: Russell 50 in TX

customer_reviews.title: Suction lacking
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for pets as I’ve found out. Great for little jobs but not for larger ones. Suction power is what I’m most disappointed with but I’ve had nothing to base previous ones on so maybe it’s good for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: B. Teske

customer_reviews.title: Great compact vac
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small handheld vac to pick up crumbs, etc around the kitchen. This is very compact, rotates and folds to a very compact size to store in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The flip out suction extension snapped off after about 6 weeks. The sweeper isn't so great either. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Mo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model because it ran on 20 volts, thus would have great suction. It does not have great suction. About on a par with the 7.2 volt DustBuster. (Actually Less suction). But it does work. But just try to get a replacement filter F101, even the Dirt Devil web site refuses to list them. Wha???
customer_reviews.author: Randall C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love the pop out crevasse tool. Lots of power for those little jobs. Easy plug in charging cord. I never really change the adjustable handle. Very easy to talk apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Byron R. Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great vac
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this model. Works like a charm, feels good to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Dieter R.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After charging the battery for 8 hours use it for 15 minutes and the battery needed to be changed again
customer_reviews.author: larry Bray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it’s discounted at dirt devsl . So you can’t replace filter
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is trash.
customer_reviews.text: Got this over the weekend. Battery doesn't hold a charge for more than 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: The flip down nozzle broke after only a few uses. The suction is not strong enough to do the job with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power was great for four months
customer_reviews.text: Power was great for four months. Battery is dead. Took it in for repair and was told it was over two years old even though I just bought in December of 2017. I assume that the warranty is not good anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy little vacuum, not quite as powerful as I had hoped but it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: bollingaleigh

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS, BUT NOT FOR LONG
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on February 20. Had great suction for 2-3 uses then it died. Tried recharging several times to no avail. You really have to be careful buying ANYTHING from Amazon due to their short window for returning items. Now I have to deal with Dirt Devil's customer service, which will probably be another exercise in trying to communicate with someone from India or some other God-forsaken craphole who is trying to read from a script. I think my best bet is to start buying stuff again from Home Depot, etc.
customer_reviews.author: patriotsblood

customer_reviews.title: Convienant but not strong
customer_reviews.text: I only use it to clean up little messes in the car but I wish it would have a better suction strength...
customer_reviews.author: danbooru.danbo

customer_reviews.title: Battery is useless
customer_reviews.text: It worked great about 3 times before the battery failed to hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for intended purpose, and found extra uses for it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshuwa Voight

customer_reviews.title: useless battery
customer_reviews.text: this battery won't charge after 4 months of VERY LIMITED use. unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work great. don't know about longevity of battery yet. looking forward to more uses to test out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a product that is needed if a household sweeper with attachments is within a house
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: ... had the vacuum for about a month and are satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: We have had the vacuum for about a month and are satisfied so far. My husband has used the carpet attachment and said it worked good. I use it on the kitchen floor. The only downside is that I wish the opening were wider. The unit does not hang.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Welsch

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dirt Devil, and I don’t think I’ve ever used the word “love” in any of my reviews before. I’ve been using Dirt Devil hand helds for 25+ years, and this is - by far - the best one yet. The charge is long lasting. I keep waiting for it to need to be recharged, but it keeps going. It’s perfect for quick pick ups. It folds up nicely and doesn’t take up much room. It’s lightweight, yet sturdy. It’s easy to clean. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nee

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Read all the Amazon reviews on this prior to buying it. I must say it is a great cordless vacuum. It has great suction, lightweight, easy to use, easy to clean, really like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: David 204

customer_reviews.title: F'n Flip Out Broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit less than 1 year ago, the flip out crevice tool was always difficult to get out, when flipping it out recently the small tabs that it hinges on broke, called for replacement, was told there isn't a replacement part for it, only have filters available. Some 2 year warranty, it breaks to f'n bad!
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Land

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum. Good suction for a small dirt devil
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love the little attachments that are connected right into place for tight spots. I also like the fact it has a brush connector for carpeted areas. Perfect for my tile floor and picking up Macaw feathers.
customer_reviews.author: scottyR00

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as older versions
customer_reviews.text: The previous version had a wall rack that also served as a charger buy this one has no wall rack and one has to plug in a cord for charging. It also gets clogged easily and the clog is difficult to clear. It does have more power than the older one and the battery life may be superior.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I like this gadget so much because it made my life easier. I used to pull my big vacuum machine whenever I spilled something, and yes I spill things a lot! This machine became my daily companion in my house cleaning routine. Hope it lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser A.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$$ spent
customer_reviews.text: Likes: sucks up hair and dust very well; long charge that lets me vacuum for a week without a charge; easy to use and store. Dislikes: NONE.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Panski

customer_reviews.title: Not for big jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in RV but keep it charged. If you have a lot to do battery life will not last. Has been a good vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Delivery timely. Packaged well. Good perfor .Serves my purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Starfield

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I love the extendable nosle to get into the nooks and crannies of my work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about 6 months. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: great. Just a bit less suction than expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great. Just a bit less suction than expected. On/off slider button is difficult. Wish it had a way to hang it and/or charging base.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to help around the house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Got it for my kids to use for small clean ups. Keeps a charge and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: ... works but it's a little heavy and I don't like that it doesn't come with a wall mount
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's a little heavy and I don't like that it doesn't come with a wall mount. I might send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price also
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what its suppose to do, pick up small messes without getting the big vacuum cleaner, great price also, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE POWERHOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought TWO of these! One for the car and one for the house. Pet hair accessory that comes with it is wonderful for all of my pets stray fur.
customer_reviews.author: TT FOWLER

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Flipout Cordless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner, Cord Free Hand Vac, Rechargeable, Small, 20V Lithium, Red, BD10320B
product_meta.description: Style Name:20 VoltThe Dirt Devil Flipout & trade; premium cordless hand vac brings power and versatility to every corner of your home. Packed with a powerful 20 volt fade-free Lithium Battery means longer runtime, faster charging time, and continuous power. It's everything you need to get the job done, and more! A compact and lightweight design with two versatile cleaning tools and an adjustable folding handle for easy cleaning and storage helps you tackle any unexpected mess with confidence.
feature_bullets: CORDLESS POWER: The battery operated, cordless design allows you to take this handheld vacuum anywhere
FADE-FREE POWER: 20V lithium battery for faster charging, longer runtime and fade-free power
4 POSITION FOLDING HANDLE: For easy cleaning and storage
LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT: Designed with an easy empty dirt cup, includes crevice tool and pet upholstery tool
LONG BATTERY LIFE: 13 hour battery life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars670 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
